website_summaries.verdict: Perfect combination of the ease of a waterbed and the support of a traditional mattress.
pros: Built with an interior padding system to support your back
Easy to set up and fill
Reduced waves with very little movement
Does not sag or bottom out
cons: If you overfill, this bed can get wavy

customer_reviews.title: Great waterbed mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Mattress was delivered in 46 hours (Prime)! This is my 2nd waterbed mattress purchase from Amazon. First one lasted 8 yrs. This new one was super easy to set up and is very comfortable! I have a lot wrong with my back & waterbeds are the only thing I can sleep on. It's scary to order mattresses online, but this is my 2nd & very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hollenbach

customer_reviews.title: Leaks but was comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bed was comfy but there is a tiny leak. So annoying to have to drain it and return it. We were so excited to have it until I saw that it was leaking. Will exchange for a new one
customer_reviews.author: C A Lewis

customer_reviews.title: BEST SLEEP WE'VE EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: We had a 60% wave-less on our last bed. Move up to this and both of us have slept AMAZING for two weeks straight. Love it. Easy enough to fill and had two spout for water intake which made air removal very simple as well. also holding our non-water-bed sheets in place just fine, which slipped off the old mattress all the time but are special fabric we both love.
customer_reviews.author: A.S. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping high and dry.
customer_reviews.text: this is far superior to the 'big sur' hibernation series mattress I previously owned of the 'same caliber' by description. the hibernation mattress material felt brittle and flimsy in comparison, and the waveless part is also much better, not to consider the lumbar support. My old mattress started coming apart at the seems in about 5 years (is this good?). I got tired of the leaks and was skeptical buying online until I saw the results. good job USA!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Most people order waterbed mattresses on an emergency basis, ...
customer_reviews.text: Most people order waterbed mattresses on an emergency basis, as I did with this one. It arrived quickly and with everything I needed to install and fill mattress was included (except water, LOL!) I am sold on this brand and company!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Trevino

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: The first mattress we received had a defect. No problem getting an immediate refund and we reordered the same mattress type. Second mattress was perfect and we are happy with the product and the handling of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: ddw

customer_reviews.title: Waterbed
customer_reviews.text: Our waterbed mattress sprung a leak at the fill tube so was not repairable. Quick trip to Amazon and we had a new mattress in record time. This is a perfect Made In America waterbed mattress. I have had a waterbed for over 30 years and this is the best mattress. Soft to the touch, very little wave when you turn over of get in and out of bed. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tangi

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on water is bliss
customer_reviews.text: I have slept on waterbed mattresses for at least 40 years. This one is as good as any I have owned. It was easy to fill, does not slosh excessively, and has so far proved reliable. I did not rate temperature control since this is a function of the heater and the mattress cover, if any, installed. I hope to get 10 years service from this one.
customer_reviews.author: chemsaf

customer_reviews.title: Came with four leaks. Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. The plastic came hard and old had water leaks in four places. I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: alda shelton

customer_reviews.title: As represented - and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I waited several months to write this review because of a prior bad experience with an online waterbed mattress purchase (not from this company). This experience was much better... mattress arrived quickly, packaged well, and was easy to setup and use. There was a strong off-gassing; so we let the mattress air out for several days before using. Other than that, it's been great and my husband and I are sleeping soundly. There is a slight "give" when entering or exiting the bed; but other than that, it doesn't really feel like a typical waterbed. We like the warmth of waterbeds... so now we have the warmth and comfort in one!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy - NJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this mattress appears to be of the same quality as our 25 year old mattress it replaced. The baffles are excellent and the wave is almost non-existent...but, still a waterbed feel. The comfort is better than the original one...I can only hope it lasts as long as the original one. It fit our California King perfectly and when filled it is a good 8"-9" deep.
customer_reviews.author: Randy I

customer_reviews.title: Leaker
customer_reviews.text: It’s great bed if they held water, filled it up and it leaked, the second one with a factory defect too, third time is a charm, hope it last’s
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with fill kit or protector solution
customer_reviews.text: Several of the pictures show a fill kit and protector solution. They were not included with the mattress. If you don't already have them you'll need to purchase them separately. Mattress seems a bit flimsy for the claimed 24 mil thickness and it is definitely not 95% waveless when fully filled. Figure maybe 80%.
customer_reviews.author: AJGB

customer_reviews.title: return went well
customer_reviews.text: first mattress leaked. but replacement came quickly and was able to have ups come and pickup leaker. process went without a problem very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: The first one leaked, which was not wonderful, but the company was great, shipped it back for free, and got the replacement shipped out the day after I submitted request. It took awhile to come, because of Co-Vid 19; but the new one is very comfortable, great support, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve had.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 3 waterbeds. This is the only one where I’m not disturbed at all by my partner getting up
customer_reviews.author: theCatman

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, our 4th or 5th waterbed mattress and it is the best we have had!
customer_reviews.author: Tim J. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Totally different experience.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I had a question, called the number on the packing list and got a fast answer. We have slept most of our 30 yeas together on a water bed mattress that was just a big bag of water. Having the foam baffles in it makes it a total different experience. My only question will be how to drain it when I need to move it.
customer_reviews.author: DWK

customer_reviews.title: This bed smells so bad
customer_reviews.text: The bed came quick and it was everything we thought it would be as we have had a waterbed for 40 years. This bed has a plastic odor that we cannot get rid of. SMELLS LIKE PLASTIC so bad
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: Good sleeping
customer_reviews.text: We are VERY satisfied with our new waterbed mattress. It's comfortable, and truly waveless. It was very easy to fill and loved the dual ports, so the air releases, as it's filling.
customer_reviews.author: lauri metzger

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a 10 year old mattress and is a huge improvement in comfort and has a nice texture. It set up very easily and it's two water inlets helped to remove air bubbles. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Quality Mattress
customer_reviews.text: We installed this mattress one month ago and the vinyl smell is finally gone. Overall the mattress is great and very comfortable. Just put up with the smell. It will dissipate. Totally worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: squiggy505

customer_reviews.title: product came in as described
customer_reviews.text: product came in as described, in a timely manner. the mattress had no holes, they vacuum seal the mattresses before shipping. only giving 4 star since it the first night, will revise it at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Its been 2 weeks.  Its what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My first waterbed mattress lasted 20 years. This is my forth. Different brand. The others leaked at a seam after about a year. So we will see! This mattress has two fill ports. First I though it might be dual bladder. I used one port to fill it and the other port to burp it while filling. It worked wonderfully. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress. Will always buy this one and it’s made in America very wind
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this bed. Have had a waterbed for over 35 years. This is the most comfortable bed ever. More like a real bed but still has the comfort and warmth of a waterbed. Very well constructed. Be sure to buy a good mattress pad. Makes it even more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: richard p.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it for long so can't speak to durability. Other than that, it seems well made and fully meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Sundborg

customer_reviews.title: We love this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is supportive without too much motion. Extremely comfortable. We're glad we went with another waterbed mattress after sleeping on this a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: KeeneGreen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in waves
customer_reviews.text: I had full wave mattresses my whole life and this feels just like a full wave. I contacted the seller but they insisted they sent the correct mattress so then the mattress must not be very good... very disappointed and will never buy again or recommend
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Dierolf

customer_reviews.title: Great price, perfect bed
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot! It is very comfortable and sturdy with no waves.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. Had about a year now and it's still perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brian Birner

customer_reviews.title: To hard
customer_reviews.text: It holds water, bed is way to hard for our liking, should have went with a less waveless rating
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Rubel

customer_reviews.title: Love our waterbed
customer_reviews.text: We have loved sleeping on a waterbed for over 35 years. Do you also handle waterbed sheets etc?
customer_reviews.author: Jan McKee

customer_reviews.title: Quality mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great waterbed mattress. I was nervous about ordering online but this exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.

customer_reviews.title: My third and best yet waterbed mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like a quality product that it is.
customer_reviews.author: PDCRUISER

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Feels more like a full wave than wave less. Not what we had wanted. It's been over a month and too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: kirbysgirl2002

customer_reviews.title: waveless
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a waterbed since 1978 and this is the 4th mattress and by far the best !!! It is the most comfortable and my back feels great again !!! I think it going bad for the last couple of years because now I feel great with the mattress change !!!
customer_reviews.author: OHWOWBill

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good price, very comfortable.... have used this brand in the past..
customer_reviews.author: Bikervg

customer_reviews.title: Waterbed mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the best waterbed mattress I bought since I've owned a waterbed for over twenty years
customer_reviews.author: pat r.

customer_reviews.title: Super mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. Replaced a 10 year old that was getting pretty wavy. It was a pain getting the old one out, but this new one is beyond comfortable. VERY good support. My sleep has improved quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: John O. McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Since my wife's accident in 1983 we have gone thru three mattresses, this by far is the best, warmth, stability and waveless
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lubben

customer_reviews.title: great service
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so very much Eddie @ Mattress Cover for your patience and service. You are very much appreciated!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale D

customer_reviews.title: Hate it. Feels like a hot firm conventional mattress
customer_reviews.text: We went from a full- wave to this waveless mattress thinking I was buying the Cadillac of WB mattresses. Hate it. Feels like a hot firm conventional mattress, not a waterbed. Gave it a month in case it just takes getting used-to. Nope. Back hurts, arms fall asleep, up 3-4 times a night walking the floor. Too bad we can’t return it. I’ll buy another full-wave as soon as my budget can take it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: kayjun2

product_meta.title: California King 95% Waveless with Lumbar Support
product_meta.description: This 95% waveless waterbed mattress is designed to have just a little bit of movement when compared to a free flow waterbed mattress. The fiber inside will contour to your body and the extra fiber in the mid section will help you sink into the mattress more level and that combination is why this mattress is so comfortable. It is also built to last with highest quality materials and it is one of the few waterbed mattresses that is actually made in the U.S.. We have it in stock and if you have any questions about our 95% waveless water mattress feel free to contact Mattress Covers Amazon store any time. Thank-you for looking at our products. Mattress Covers Amazon store.
feature_bullets: California King Waveless waterbed mattress only has about 3-4 seconds of slow movement
Contour Mid Body Support which will let you sink into the mattress more level.
Heavy duty vinyl with reinforced corners for years of service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
